model
Interface ModelDescriptor

All Known Implementing Classes:
Automaton.AutomatonDescriptor
public interface ModelDescriptor

A descriptor for a DES model. A plugin wishing to implement a new DES model should implment this interface and the register it with the ModelManager.

Author:
Lenko Grigorov
See Also:
ModelManager.registerModel(ModelDescriptor)

Method Summary
 DESModel createModel(String id)
          Creates and returns a new model of this type.
 DESModel createModel(String id, String name)
          Creates and returns a new model of this type.
 Image getIcon()
          Returns an small image (icon) which can be displayed to the user to identify the model type.
 Class[] getModelInterfaces()
          Returns all the DES model interfaces this model implements.
 Class getPreferredModelInterface()
          Returns the "main" DES model interface to be used with the model.
 String getTypeDescription()
          Returns a huma-readable description of the type of the model.
 

Method Detail

getModelInterfaces

Class[] getModelInterfaces()
Returns all the DES model interfaces this model implements. For example, if it implements an FSA, it should return FSAModel. Custom interfaces can be returned as well.

Returns:
all DES model interfaces this model implements

getPreferredModelInterface

Class getPreferredModelInterface()
Returns the "main" DES model interface to be used with the model. For example, if the model of an FSA provides an EventSet interface for access to its event set, this method should return FSAModel since this is the main purpose of the model.

Returns:
the interface for the main purpose of the model

getTypeDescription

String getTypeDescription()
Returns a huma-readable description of the type of the model. For example, "Petri net".

Returns:
human readable description of the model type

getIcon

Image getIcon()
Returns an small image (icon) which can be displayed to the user to identify the model type.

Returns:
an icon to serve as identification of the model type in the UI

createModel

DESModel createModel(String id)
Creates and returns a new model of this type.

Parameters:
id - the ID which will be used to identify the model instance. Preferrably a unique string (General.getRandomId() can be used).
Returns:
the new model
See Also:
General.getRandomId()

createModel

DESModel createModel(String id,
                     String name)
Creates and returns a new model of this type.

Parameters:
id - the ID which will be used to identify the model instance. Preferrably a unique string (General.getRandomId() can be used).
name - the display name to be assigned to the new model
Returns:
the new model
See Also:
General.getRandomId()
